report.title: Species & Occurrence Counts by text sample attribute
report.description: Lists taxon groups and the number of species and occurrences within them. Optional date range and survey filters.
report.query: SELECT sav.text_value as attr, count(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count, #website_id# as website_id FROM occurrences o JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values sav on sav.sample_id=s.id and sav.sample_attribute_id=#attr_id# and sav.deleted=false WHERE o.website_id=#website_id# AND o.record_status<>'R' AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) GROUP BY sav.text_value UNION SELECT 'Total', count(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count, #website_id# as website_id FROM occurrences o JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values sav on sav.sample_id=s.id and sav.sample_attribute_id=#attr_id# and sav.deleted=false WHERE o.website_id=#website_id# AND o.record_status<>'R' AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND '#include_total#'!='no'

param.name: website_id
param.description: Select the website to return data for

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: attr_id
param.description: Which attribute should the report be grouped by to produce the species and occurrence counts? The attribute you select must be text datatype.
